characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a bus
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. A white sedan is ahead, and a bus is overtaking from the right side. The bus moves into the lane, causing the self-driving vehicle to slow down to avoid a collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates to maintain a safe distance from the white sedan ahead and to avoid collision with the bus overtaking from the right side. The vehicles speed gradually decreases over the 10 seconds, maintaining a safe distance from the vehicles ahead.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right: A bus, approximately 2 meters away, overtaking and moving into the lane.
